price: 3. Bakitani baye tomemaki elongo na Núh. Ya sôló, ye azalaki mowumbu wa botondi.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَ مَنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٍۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَبۡدٗا شَكُورٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyata man ḥamalnā maʿa nūḥin innahu kāna ʿabdan shakūran
